Name: heat production, at coal coke industrial furnace 1-10MW | heat, district or industrial, other than natural gas | EN15804GD, U
Category: D:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/35:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/353:Steam and air conditioning supply/3530:Steam and air conditioning supply
Description: Combustion of coke coal in an industrial furnace is modeled based on an combustion of hard coal in an industrial boiler in early 1990s. It is assumed both fuels have similar emission profiles. Stoker boiler used as reference technology. Uncertainty has been modified accordingly.
